Introduction
This topic contains guidance on the general principles for evaluating genitourinary dysfunction, including
rating genitourinary disorders
renal dysfunction
determining the chronicity of renal dysfunction
use of catheters and other appliances
urinary tract infection
recurrent stone formation
, and
changes in the rating schedule for the genitourinary system
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 7Â - Genitourinary Disabilities
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 7, Section None
